name: LANES! (WEB)
description:
LANES! is an "infinite driver" game inspired by action games like Excitebike and Battletoads. Race down the highway for as long as you can without crashing into other vehicles! Get the highest score by passing or jumping over cars, vans, trucks, and even buses! Are you a true road warrior?

This is my first Unity game! Please enjoy!

If you like this game, download the Windows or Mac version at wizziwig.itch.io/lanes
